meta_title: What Does "We Want to Defect" Mean? B2B Vendor Switching
meta_description: Define the meaning of vendor defection in industrial maintenance. Learn about CMMS migration, switching costs, and how to manage a clean break from legacy systems.
title: What Is the Meaning of "We Want to Defect"?
